basics.name: Jonatan Scheines
basics.label: Frontend developer with over 12 years of experience
basics.summary: Frontend developer with over 12 years of experience in the technology sector. Specializing in crafting intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces, they possess strong technical skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, and React. Their commitment to code quality and application usability is evident in their track record across diverse projects in various sectors. A proactive collaborator with a positive attitude, they have demonstrated leadership in contributing to successful team efforts.
